â€œIn the past, twenty-one eons ago,
I was a teacher of a group of people.
I saw the dust-free Buddha,
the receiver of offerings.
I gave a piece of skin

Because of that deed, O leader of men,

I experienced perfection,
and I burned up the defilements.
I bear this last body
in the dispensation of the Buddha.
